name: ixpconst
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), co(c1, cmap, c0))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), co(c1, cmap, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), co(c1, cmap, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), co(c1, cmap, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), co(c1, cmap, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), co(c1, cmap, c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), co(c1, cmap, c0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), co(c1, cmap, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Infinite Cartesian product of a constant ` B ` . (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2006.)
